Partners: KPN (Netherlands), Odido (Netherlands), VodafoneZiggo (Netherlands), TU Delft (Netherlands), TU Eindhoven (Netherlands), NXP (Netherlands), ASML (Netherlands), SURF (Netherlands), SIDN (Netherlands), University of Twente (Netherlands), Photons (Netherlands)

Partners: TU Munich (Germany), Barkhausen Institut (Germany), Bosch (Germany), Rohde & Schwarz (Germany), Vodafone (Germany), Globalfoundries (Germany)

Partners: Ericsson (Germany), Vodafone (Germany), Airbus (Germany), Bosch (Germany), Siemens (Germany), Deutsche Telekom (Germany), TU Dresden (Germany), TU Munich (Germany), Fraunhofer HHI (Germany), Fraunhofer IPT (Germany), RWTH Aachen (Germany), Carl Zeiss (Germany)
